name: Sigma Star Saga
overview: In Sigma Star Saga, humanity is struggling to survive against an onslaught by ruthless aliens. Survive as a double agent for the humans and the Krill, and discover the secret of the six planets in Sigma Star Saga for Game Boy Advance. Play the first RPG to feature an action-packed space shooter battle system. Customize your weapons with 27,000 Gun Data combinations. Experience the branching story with multiple endings with over 20+ hours of gameplay. • An action-packed space-shooter battle system – the first of its kind for an RPG • Customizable weapons with more than 50 different "Gun Data" items • A branching storyline with multiple endings
